heroSection.title: Transform Your Figma Designs into Pixel Perfect Shopify Stores
heroSection.content:
Got a stunning design in Figma but struggling to bring it to life on Shopify?
We specialize in pixel-perfect Figma to Shopify conversions that don't just look amazing – they sell like crazy.

steps.title: Design Analysis & Planning
steps.content: We dive deep into your Figma files, understanding every element, interaction, and user flow you've envisioned.

steps.title: Custom Code Development
steps.content: Our developers hand-code every section using clean HTML, CSS, and JavaScript – no bloated page builders that slow down your site.

steps.title: Responsive Optimization
steps.content: Your design looks perfect on desktop, tablet, and mobile. We ensure every breakpoint is flawless.

steps.title: Shopify Integration
steps.content: We seamlessly integrate all Shopify functionalities – cart, checkout, product pages, collections, and more

steps.title: Speed & SEO Optimization
steps.content: Your store loads in under 3 seconds and is optimized for search engines from day one.

steps.title: Quality Testing
steps.content: Rigorous testing across browsers and devices ensures everything works perfectly before launch.

whyChoose.subtitle: Why Choose Us Section
whyChoose.title: The Numbers Don't Lie
whyChoose.content: Get the ultimate team and learn how to grow your audience and build an online business.
whyChoose.list1: 150+ Successful Figma to Shopify Conversions We've perfected our process across dozens of industries and design styles.
whyChoose.list2: Average 35% Increase in Conversion Rates Custom designs optimized for sales consistently outperform generic themes.
whyChoose.list3: 2-Week Average Delivery Time Fast turnaround without compromising on quality.
whyChoose.list4: 99.8% Client Satisfaction Rate Our clients love the results, and many come back for additional projects.

faqlist.title: Clean, Maintainable Code
faqlist.content:
W3C validated HTML & CSS
Well-commented code for future developers
Follows Shopify's best practices and coding standards

faqlist.title: SEO-Optimized Structure
faqlist.content:
Semantic HTML markup for better search rankings
Optimized meta tags and schema markup
Fast loading speeds that Google loves

faqlist.title: Cross-Browser Compatibility
faqlist.content:
Works perfectly on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge
Tested on both Windows and Mac systems
Mobile browser optimization included

faqlist.title: Future-Proof Development
faqlist.content:
Compatible with Shopify's latest features and updates
Scalable architecture that grows with your business
Easy to add new sections and functionality later

chooseHeading.subtitle: Key Features & Benefits Section
chooseHeading.title:
Use SEO to Drive Growth
at Your Business
chooseHeading.content:
The a long established fact that a reader will be

chooseContent.title: Faster Load Times
chooseContent.content: Most sites see 40–70% speed improvement after our optimization.

chooseContent.title: Higher SEO Rankings
chooseContent.content: Speed is a known ranking factor—better speed = better visibility.

chooseContent.title: Reduced Bounce Rate
chooseContent.content: Users stay longer and convert better when your site loads fast.

chooseContent.title: No Design Compromise
chooseContent.content: Your UI and branding stay untouched—we only optimize under the hood.

appContent.appContent: We optimized a Shopify Plus store with 6,000+ products and reduced load time from 9s to under 3s.
Replaced bloated page builders and trimmed plugins for a 50% performance boost.
We’ve helped agencies improve client site speed scores before launch.
